de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.evaluate

Interface ImvEvaluationComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImvEvaluationUnit, ImvEvaluator, ImvEvaluatorManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImvEvaluationUnit, DefaultImvEvaluator, DefaultImvEvaluatorManager

    public interface ImvEvaluationComponent
    Generic base extension for the composition of integrity measurement components for an IMV.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair getRecommendation(ImSessionContext context)
      Asks the integrity measurement component part for its recommendation.
      boolean hasRecommendation()
      Checks whether the integrity measurement component part is ready to provide a recommendation.

    • Method Detail

      • getRecommendation

        de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.ImvRecommendationPair getRecommendation(ImSessionContext context)
        Asks the integrity measurement component part for its recommendation. For the recommendation, it can take connection specific values from the context in to account.
        Parameters:
        context - the context, which holds connection specific values
        Returns:
        the recommendation pair (recommendation, result)

      • hasRecommendation

        boolean hasRecommendation()
        Checks whether the integrity measurement component part is ready to provide a recommendation.
        Returns:
        true if it is ready to return a recommendation
